meanings.sent1: The herbal tea is nonintoxicating and perfect for a relaxing evening.
meanings.sent2: The nonintoxicating nature of the medication makes it safe for daily use.
meanings.sent3: She joked that the nonintoxicating cookies were so bland, they couldn't even make a teddy bear tipsy.
meanings.sent4: The music had a nonintoxicating effect on the crowd, calming them instantly.
meanings.sent5: The nonintoxicating scent of lavender filled the room, creating a peaceful atmosphere.

meanings.sent1: The nonintoxicating beverage was a hit at the party, keeping everyone sober and happy.
meanings.sent2: The nonintoxicating beer was a popular choice among designated drivers.
meanings.sent3: He found it amusing that the nonintoxicating punch was more popular than the alcoholic ones.
meanings.sent4: The nonintoxicating atmosphere of the library made it a perfect place to study without distractions.
meanings.sent5: The nonintoxicating charm of the small town drew visitors looking for a peaceful getaway.
